question: Which Bollywood actress has been chosen as the brand ambassador of Rising Himachal Global Investors'Â Meet 2019?
explanation: Yami Gautam was chosen brand ambassador of Rising Himachal Global Investors\' Meet 2019 to be held from November 7 and 8, 2019. Rising Himachal Global Investors\' Meet 2019 is conceptualized to re-establish Himachal as a favored investment destination in India. In this event Himachal will showcase the policy & regulatory environment, investment opportunities across various sectors to boost manufacturing and employment generation in the state.
